capsules_submitted.utterance: So Vernon is the supervisor at the title company. I'm not sure about that, but it's definitely true - I've seen his name on official documents and he's been in charge of our department for a while now.
capsules_submitted.reply: this is news to me. i've never heard of vernon before, tell me more about him!

capsules_submitted.utterance: Vernon's lineage is quite interesting. I've been studying his family history and it seems that he has a condition called maculogy, which affects the shape of his eyes. I'm fairly certain about this information, and I'd say it's a pretty well-established fact. Overall, I think Vernon's unique physical feature adds to his charm.
capsules_submitted.reply: i did not know that! i've never heard of maculogy before, irma   what's that all about?

capsules_submitted.utterance: So I've been doing some research on Dudley and it seems that his lineage is quite complex. capsules_submitted.utterance: So I've been thinking about Dudley's personality and from what I know, he's got a pretty unconventional approach to life.
